icon description: fanart of scanlan from my critical role firefly au. he is a pale gnome with brown hair. he is posing like a model, with one hand behind his head and the other at his waist. his vest is rich purple with gold accents. he is wearing shear purple gloves and golden bicep jewelry. his makeup is purple-tinted. the background is pink. end id.

header credit (technically): @shadedforests

header description: a screenshot of an instagram message, a white bubble with black text, that reads, "Fuck you vax you made me chuckle". end id.

summary: Here is one more question for the Critical Role fandom: where is the best place to watch season 2? I was using VRV to listen to...
body:
Here is one more question for the Critical Role fandom: where is the best place to watch season 2? I was using VRV to listen to season 1 but it’s been kind of glitchy so any better recommended places would be greatly appreciated! Is there an official website to watch too? I am a lost gatto

blog.name: lostandfoundcharacters
blog.title: Pre-fab d&d characters
blog.description: A collection of characters we built but never played, played once before disbanding, or just thought sounded good but never found a place for. The characters within these pages are free to us by any and all. We'd love to hear all about their adventures!

summary: so we’re thinking about dedicating this tumblr to pre-made dnd characters. kind of like the characters found in the starter set,...
body:
so we’re thinking about dedicating this tumblr to pre-made dnd characters. kind of like the characters found in the starter set, but wider variety, different levels, etc. not just for beginning players, but for anyone who can’t think of what they want to play right now, or just wants something quick and easy.

Is this something people would be interested in?

reblog.comment:

tags: i just wanna start with the best recommended fnsnd
summary: So I started listening to Critical Role about a month ago, and ofc I started at the beginning.  (First episode of first season)...
body:
So I started listening to Critical Role about a month ago, and ofc I started at the beginning. (First episode of first season) , but most my friends have said they started in season 2…? So now I’m wondering if I should skip there, or keep at it of where I’m at now? I don’t know if I’ll miss any important plot stuff that way or not (I’m only on episode 3, I’m way behind). And I do quite love the characters in season 1, to which I have no idea if any of the same ones appear in season 2 >.> help a gatto

EDIT: THANKS FOR ALL THE QUICK FEEDBACK, I HAVE BEEN HELPED

tags: why do i do this to myself
summary: Things I should not have done on a day when I was supposed to be having fun: spoken up in a Reddit thread about Molly. I’ve had...
body:
Things I should not have done on a day when I was supposed to be having fun: spoken up in a Reddit thread about Molly. I’ve had a few too many unhappy thoughts about all that for a while and thoughts about the game and plot/DM choices I’m still struggling with, and they kinda all spilled out. The reception was about as welcoming as you’d guess. I don’t know why I said anything. I honestly started crying a minute ago and it wasn’t even over anything anyone said, more just a WHY DO I EVER GODDAMN TALK sort of feeling.

The upshot, though, was that I didn’t understand why any of the plot that led up to it was necessary, and I still don’t.
